en.tutorial-plant-instruction: Press [H] to plant the sprouts in the rocky holes.
en.tutorial-move-instr-2: Use [A] and [D] or the [Left Arrow] and [Right Arrow] keys to move.
en.tutorial-collect-instr-2: Walk over the eggs to collect them!
en.tutorial-move-instr-3: Use [WASD] or the [Arrow Keys] to move.
en.tutorial-action-instr-3: Use left click to throw pills and purify the ghosts.
en.tutorial-objective-instr-3: Get close and press [H] to close the valves.
en.gameover-subtitle-1:
Don't give up,
there are still seeds to plant!
en.gameover-subtitle-2:
Try again,
the eggs are counting on you!
en.gameover-subtitle-3:
Go back in
and stop that leak in time!
en.press-m-to-menu: Press M to go to Menu
en.wingame_subtitle-1:
Your trees breathe
for the planet.
en.wingame_subtitle-2:
You saved the
next generation of ice.
en.wingame_subtitle-3:
You defeated the
ghosts of pollution.
en.mission-text: Head to the lake to collect water to water the tree shoots
en.mission-text-2: Collect the penguin chick eggs that are scattered across the mountain
en.mission-text-3-warning: Find them fast... They don't like visitors.
en.exit-game-notice-title: Are you sure you want to exit?
en.exit-game-notice-description: All progress for this level will be lost.
en.exit-game-notice-prompt: Press (Y) to Exit / (N) to Go Back

es.tutorial-plant-instruction: Presiona [H] para plantar los brotes en los hoyos con piedras.
es.tutorial-attack-instr: Haz clic izquierdo para lanzar bananas.
es.tutorial-move-instr-2: Usa [A] y [D] o las [Flecha Izquierda] y [Flecha Derecha] para moverte.
es.tutorial-action-instr-3: Haz clic izquierdo para lanzar píldoras y purificar a los fantasmas.
es.tutorial-objective-instr-3: Acércate y presiona [H] para cerrar las válvulas.
es.gameover-subtitle-1: No te rindas,¡quedan semillas por plantar!
es.gameover-subtitle-3: ¡Vuelve a entrar y detén esa fuga a tiempo!
es.press-m-to-menu: Presiona M para ir al Menú
es.press-r-to-restart: Presiona R para reiniciar el nivel
es.wingame_subtitle-1:
Tus árboles respiran
por el planeta.
es.wingame_subtitle-2:
Salvaste a la próxima
generación del hielo.
es.wingame_subtitle-3:
Venciste a los fantasmas
de la contaminación.
es.mission-text: Dirígete al lago para recolectar agua y poder regar los brotes de árbol
es.mission-text-2: Recoge los huevos de cría pingüino que están esparcidas por la montaña
es.mission-text-3-warning: Encuéntralas rápido... No les gustan las visitas.
es.exit-game-notice-description: Se perderá todo el progreso de este nivel.
